title: Game is crashing my entire computer
body:
Title. I was wondering if anyone had any solutions. My computer doesn't seem to be overheating, and it used to run league absolutely fine when I last regularly played which was a few months ago.
However, it's been getting to every game where I'll get into a game for not even a minute in game before I am forced to force restart my computer.
My computer is only about a year old; it shouldn't have any problems running the game. I've just redownloaded the entire game to no avail.

replies.body:
I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)
This seems to have worked so far. Thanks a lot!

I'd like to help you out, but I'm having trouble pinpointing what your exact issue is.  What do you mean exactly when you have to restart your computer?  What are you seeing, and when is it happening?  Do you receive any error messages?  Let me know!
